description:
Newland & Newland, LLP, is located in Arlington Heights, Illinois. Our attorneys draw on more than 50 years of combined experience providing quality representation. As brothers, our lawyers share a dedication to a client-focused philosophy that informs our practice as well as our perspectives on law and life.

Let our family help yours. We provide legal services in a wide range of practice areas, including:

  • Personal Injury: We have obtained millions of dollars in verdicts and settlements for clients who have been injured physically, emotionally and financially.
  • Workers' Compensation: We enjoy a reputation for repeatedly delivering results, even when the employer and insurance company are extremely unsympathetic.
  • Foreclosure Defense: We provide aggressive foreclosure defense in state and federal court.
  • Bankruptcy: If you are drowning in debt, bankruptcy may be your lifeboat. We can counsel you on all your options for obtaining financial freedom, including Chapter 7, Chapter 11 and Chapter 13 and loan modifications.
  • Immigration: We provide knowledgeable legal services for family- and employment-based immigration, visas, deportation defense, citizenship and asylum.
  • Wills,Trusts and Probate: We offer comprehensive estate planning services to help families and individuals carry out their wishes.
  • Business Law: We advise businesses on commercial leasing, sanctions for failing to carry workers' compensation insurance and other common legal concerns.
  • Commercial Litigation: As experienced trial attorneys, we represent businesses in commercial litigation and other business disputes.

Our firm is a Better Business Bureau Accredited Business. Additionally, our attorneys are members of the Illinois Real Estate Lawyers Association and the National Association of Consumer Bankruptcy Attorneys as well as state and local bar associations. Throughout our careers, we have handled cases that were featured in national and international news.

To arrange a free consultation, call 847-797-8000. We serve clients throughout the area, including Cook County, Lake County, DuPage County, McHenry County, Kane County and Will County with additional offices in Libertyville, Chicago, Crystal Lake and Itasca.
